    • Uses of Buffer in com.thesonofthom.maps

      Subclasses of Buffer in com.thesonofthom.maps 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BmpHeaderMap
      Map to easily parse the BMP file format used by Windows.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitfieldMask
      Structure of the Bitfield Mask that optionally following a bmp that contians a BITMAPINFOHEADER DIB Header.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapCoreHeader
      Same as the BITMAPCOREHEADER struct.
      static class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapFileHeader
      Map to parse the header of a potential BMP file to determine if it is, in fact, a bitmap
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapInfoHeader
      Same as the BITMAPINFOHEADER struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapV3InfoHeader
      Same as the BITMAPV3INFOHEADER struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapV4Header
      Same as the BITMAPV4HEADER struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.BitmapV5Header
      Same as the BITMAPV5HEADER struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.CieXYZ
      Same as the CIEXYZ struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.CieXYZTriple
      Same as the CIEXYZTRIPLE struct.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.DIBHeader
      Base class for all different DIB Header types.
      class  BmpHeaderMap.RGBQuad
      Same as the RGBQUAD struct.
      class  PngFileMap
      Map to easily parse the PNG file format.
      class  PngFileMap.BKGDChunkData
      Data section for "bKGD" chunks.
      class  PngFileMap.BKGDChunkDataColor
      Data section for "bKGD" chunks when the ColorType is TrueColor or TrueColorWithAlpha
      class  PngFileMap.BKGDChunkDataGreyscale
      Data section for "bKGD" chunks when the ColorType is Greyscale or GreyscaleWithAlpha
      class  PngFileMap.BKGDChunkDataIndexed
      Data section for "bKGD" chunks when the ColorType is Indexed_color
      class  PngFileMap.CHRMChunkData
      Data section for "cHRM" chunks
      class  PngFileMap.Chunk
      Class for parsing all Chunk types besides IHDR
      class  PngFileMap.ChunkData
      Abstract class to represent the data section of each Chunk
      class  PngFileMap.GAMAChunkData
      Data section for "gAMA" chunks
      class  PngFileMap.GenericChunkData
      for Chunks that we have not yet defined
      class  PngFileMap.ICCPChunkData
      Data section for "iCCP" chunks
      class  PngFileMap.IDATChunkData
      Data section for "IDAT" (actual data) chunks
      class  PngFileMap.IHDRChunk
      the IHDR chunk will always appear immediately after the standard PNG header
      class  PngFileMap.ITXTChunkData
      Data section for "iTXt" chunks
      class  PngFileMap.PHYSChunkData
      Data section for "pHYs" chunks
      class  PngFileMap.PLTEChunkData
      Data section for "PLTE" chunks
      class  PngFileMap.PLTEChunkData.PLTEChunkEntry
      For each entry in the array in a "PLTE" chunk
      static class  PngFileMap.PngHeader
      Map to parse the header of a potential PNG file to determine if it is, in fact, a PNG file
      class  PngFileMap.SBITChunkData
      Data section for "sBIT" chunks.
      class  PngFileMap.SBITChunkDataGrayscale

      Data section for "sRGB" chunks

      class  WinExeFileHeaderMap
      Map to easily parse the header of standard Windows Executable files (.exe, .dll, etc).
      static class  WinExeFileHeaderMap.DOSHeaderMap
      Map to parse the "DOS Header" section of the executable file header.
      static class  WinExeFileHeaderMap.PEHeaderMap
      Map to parse the "PE Header" section of the executable file header.
      class  WinExeFileHeaderMap.PEHeaderMap.COFFHeaderMap
      Map to Parse the "COFF Header" section of the executable file header The COFF header is present in both COFF object files (before they are linked) and in PE files where it is known as the "File header".
      class  WinExeFileHeaderMap.PEHeaderMap.COFFHeaderMap.COFFHeaderCharacteristics
      Map to define the individual bits that represents the Characteristics field in the COFF Header
      class  WinExeFileHeaderMap.PEHeaderMap.DataDirectory
      Class to parse the individual fields in the DataDirectory array inside the PE Optional Header Same as the IMAGE_DATA_DIRECTORY struct in WinNT.h
      class  WinExeFileHeaderMap.PEHeaderMap.DLLCharacteristics
      Map to define the individual bits that represents the DLLCharacteristics field in the PE Optional Header
      class  WinExeFileHeaderMap.PEHeaderMap.PEOptionalHeader
      Map to parse the "PE Optional Header" in the header.

      class  BufferMap
      This class is a powerful tool that can be used to easily parse a binary buffer of data (byte array) that contains static, known data.
